Get Public Domain Audio from the Internet Archive

08 Feb 2018

I was reading a post on Metafilter awhile back that linked to a bunch of Sherlock Holmes radio shows posted on the Internet Archive.

I realized that the archive is a great source for audio recordings for sampling or other creative uses.Â  Here are some handy links for searching audio by licenses that allow derivative and commercial usage:

  • Public Domain
  • Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike
  • Creative Commons Attribution

The Internet Archive is a great source for public domain and CC licensed audio files.
